Package org.agilewiki.jactor2.common.pubSub

A request bus is used to broadcast either signals or requests to any number of subscribers.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    RequestBus<CONTENT>
    A blade that publishes content to interested subscribers, using either signals or sends.
    SubscribeAOp<CONTENT>
    A request to subscribe to the content published by a RequestBus.
    Subscription<CONTENT>
    A subscription allows a subscriber to receive content of interest from a RequestBus.

Package org.agilewiki.jactor2.common.pubSub Description

A request bus is used to broadcast either signals or requests to any number of subscribers.
